Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to furloughs of employees by certain public retirement systems
Summary: Provides that public employees placed on furlough shall be entitled to any pension service credits such person would have received if employed full time.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to furloughs of employees by certain public retirement systems; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
